question: Tathāgato sāvakehi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gacchati.
answer: The Thus-Gone goes to the monastery with his disciples.
incorrect1: The Well-Gone goes to the monastery with his disciples.

answer: The farmer runs to the island with his son.

incorrect2: The farmer runs to the island with his sons.
incorrect3: The men run to the island with their sons.
